metadata.synopsis: Player gets this narrator line when tries to interact with a body of a dead waveservant without permission
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Load CTY_Main_A2. Don't accept Allandra's quest and make sure that waveservants around see you3. Interact with a body on the altargoto -247.1; 6.5; -260.67

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *A pointed glare informs you that you shouldn't go anywhere near the waveservant's body.*
